title: Airwheel intelligent personal walkcar electric scooter
text: Airwheel intelligent personal walkcar electric scooter , 25 September 2015 -- Airwheel electric scooter is well recognized for its marvelous and time-tested scooter performances.The reliable and time tested performance of Airwheel self-balancing electric scooter is well recognized by people, and here is a brief summary of some exclusive shinning points that are shared by all Airwheel electric scooter types. The first shinny point comes from the tech intelligence that is smartly applied to improve the overall performance of Airwheel electric self-balancing scooters. The built-in intelligent chip is able to monitor the electric scooter and better reacts to some situations like surpassing the limit speed or the riding with lack of balance keeping. Besides, the application of original Sony lithium battery plays a crucial role in promoting the performance of Airwheel electric scooter since the power supply is the heart of the scooter and is the source of energy for the running scooter. The premium Sony battery has huge power capacity and is able to realize sustainable power supply. The second shinny point comes from the endurable and premium material applied to the scooter body framework. The selective application of aluminum alloy as well as the synthetic material by nanotechnology contributes a lot to the durability and quality of Airwheel electric scooter. The handles are covered soft by silica gel and the pedals are made with anti-skidding material. Moreover, the total enclosed framework is resistant to dust, oil and water, which is free from the anxiety of scooter cleaning maintenance. Most importantly, Airwheel electric scooter stands out in aspect of safety guarantees and is specially equipped with more protection mechanisms. For instance, the electronic braking system is specially designed to protect riders from the potential dangers from emergency brakes, and the scooter will react to emergency brakes faster. In terms of limit speed, Airwheel electric scooter can automatically slow down and remind riders of potential dangers by slowly raising up the pedals. Those protection mechanism is actually related with the tech intelligence of the Airwheel scooter, which works as a brain for human beings. In a word, the shinning points of Airwheel electric self-balancing scooter all come from the brain and heart of Airwheel electric scooters- the built-in intelligent chip and premium quality battery. About: Established in 2004, Airwheel Technology was initiated by a group of pioneers who took constant adventure to reshape the world with edged technology. With a global view, the U.S.-based enterprise started to build since its establishment R&D centers located in L.A., Beijing, and Changzhou, a marketing center in Beijing and a manufacturing center in Changzhou. As the leader in global portable intelligent transport industry, we have been dedicated to extend the fun and benefit of cutting-edge technology to everywhere in the world.
